INSERT INTO devops_sonar_analyse_issue_author (record_id, author, bug, vulnerability, code_smell) VALUES
(#{recordId}, #{item.author}, #{item.bug}, #{item.vulnerability}, #{item.codeSmell})
mapper.select: select dsaia.* from devops_sonar_analyse_issue_author dsaia where dsaia.record_id = (select max(id) from devops_sonar_analyse_record where app_service_id = #{appServiceId})

select dsaia.author, dsaia.bug as number from devops_sonar_analyse_issue_author dsaia where dsaia.record_id = (select max(id) from devops_sonar_analyse_record where app_service_id = #{appServiceId}) order by dsaia.bug desc

select dsaia.author, dsaia.vulnerability as number from devops_sonar_analyse_issue_author dsaia where dsaia.record_id = (select max(id) from devops_sonar_analyse_record where app_service_id = #{appServiceId}) order by dsaia.vulnerability desc

select dsaia.author, dsaia.code_smell as number from devops_sonar_analyse_issue_author dsaia where dsaia.record_id = (select max(id) from devops_sonar_analyse_record where app_service_id = #{appServiceId}) order by dsaia.code_smell desc
